class.name: Task
class.inst-vars: title done createdAt lastModifiedAt priority tags

comment.body: Task represents a single todo item with title, completion status, priority, and tags.

methods.body: initialize super initialize. done := false. createdAt := Date today. lastModifiedAt := DateAndTime now. priority := #medium. tags := OrderedCollection new.
initialize: aTitle "Initialize task with a title" self initialize. title := aTitle.
initialize: aTitle priority: aPriority "Initialize task with a title and priority" self initialize. title := aTitle. priority := aPriority.
title: aString title := aString. self markModified.
done: aBoolean done := aBoolean. self markModified.
